oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Lt. [Alfred C.] Williams, Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of Lt. [Alfred C.] Williams, Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Williams was born on June 9, 1823. He was a native of Stoney Creek, Carter County, Tennessee. Williams mustered in when his company was organized on September 22, 1863. He achieved the rank of 2nd Lieutenant before resigning on September 26, 1864, having experienced ill health throughout his military service. He died in Elizabethton on August 28, 1900, and is buried in Buckles Cemetery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Williams, Alfred Carter
